footer.description: is the most trusted cryptocurrency trading platform, offering advanced tools and top-tier security. Our mission is to create the best trading experience and give our clients the freedom to trade without limitations.

riskWarning.title: Risk Warning:
riskWarning.text: Trading Forex and CFDs carries a high level of risk to your capital and you should only trade with money you can afford to lose. Trading Forex and CFDs may not be suitable for all investors.

regulatory.tradeExecution: Trade execution, pricing, speed, and account access may be affected by a variety of factors including market volatility, order size and type, trading volume, and system performance. During periods of high market activity or limited system availability, delays in account access and trade execution may occur. Investors should be aware of these risks and plan accordingly when placing trades.
regulatory.ageRequirement: You must be 18 years old, or of legal age as determined in your country.

about.title: Building a fair crypto future
about.subtitle: We’re a small team exploring transparent tools for trading, custody, and education—so anyone can navigate digital assets with confidence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body1: Demystify crypto with human-friendly design and robust engineering.
mission.body2: From self-custody to analytics, we focus on practical features that actually help you trade and learn.

security.title: Security by design
security.body: Private keys, smart contract audits, and sane defaults to keep you safe.

openAccess.title: Open access
openAccess.body: Borderless value transfer and permissionless participation.

innovation.title: Relentless innovation
innovation.body: New primitives like L2s, account abstraction, and restaking unlock fresh ideas.

values.title: Values We Stand By
values.lead: What guides our decisions every day.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.body: Clear fees, open docs, honest roadmaps.

performance.title: Performance
performance.body: Fast UIs, reliable APIs, and smooth charts.

security.title: Security
security.body: Ship safely, audit often, defend users first.

tech.title: Technology
tech.lead: A pragmatic stack focused on resilience and clarity.

chains.title: Multi-chain
chains.body: Support for major L1s/L2s with sensible defaults.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.body: Readable insights, not noise—so you can act quickly.

global.title: Global-ready
global.body: Localization, fiat on-ramps, and compliance-aware flows.

security.title: Security-first crypto infrastructure
security.subtitle: We combine layered defenses, pragmatic custody options, and transparent operations to protect your digital assets.

defenseInDepth.title: Defense in depth
defenseInDepth.body: Multiple safeguards—network hardening, WAF, rate limiting, and strict isolation across critical services.

encryption.title: Modern encryption
encryption.body: TLS in transit, envelope encryption at rest, and strong key rotation aligned with industry guidance.

monitoring.title: Monitoring & alerts
monitoring.body: Real-time detections for anomalies, integrity checks, and actionable incident playbooks.

keyManagement.title: Key management
keyManagement.body: Separation of duties, least privilege, and explicit approvals for sensitive key operations.

globalCompliance.title: Global readiness
globalCompliance.body: Localization and policy-aware flows that support varied regional requirements.

risk.title: Risk controls
risk.body: Withdrawal allowlists, velocity limits, and behavior analysis to reduce fraud and mistakes.

custody.title: Custody & control
custody.lead: Choose between non-custodial and assisted models without sacrificing safety.

points.nonCustodial: Non-custodial by default—your keys, your coins.
points.hardware: Hardware wallet compatibility for cold storage.

operations.title: Secure operations
operations.lead: Security isn’t a feature; it’s a process we practice daily.

points.codeReviews: Mandatory code reviews and continuous testing.
points.incident: Clear incident response, postmortems, and fast patches.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our crypto services.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: By accessing or using our platform, you agree to abide by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you may not use the platform.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.body: We respect your privacy and handle data according to our Privacy Policy. No unnecessary tracking or selling of your information.

points.legal: You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
points.fair: Use the platform in good faith, without exploiting vulnerabilities.
points.restrictions: Do not engage in fraud, money laundering, or prohibited financial activities.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: We strive for uptime and accuracy, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted service or error-free operation. Users are responsible for their trading decisions.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: Cryptocurrency involves risk. Prices can fluctuate, and you may lose capital. Nothing here constitutes financial advice.
